catList: The course will focus on modeling and analysis of strategic level decision making problems and will be delivered as a joint effort between the instructors from an industrial partner and instructor(s) from Sabanci University. Unlike the operational level decision problems, strategic level decision problems do not have a well-defined mathematical structure. Therefore, modeling and analysis of strategic decision making problems require different set of approaches and methods. The benefit of efficient management of strategic decision making process would be significant for the firms. The course will cover various strategic decision making problems such as business transformation management, nnovation and technology management, leading change and its dynamics, competitiveness, etc., which will be introduced considering the real life industry setting with the support of the industrial partner. The role of big data in modeling and analysis of these strategic level problems will be emphasized, and various data analysis techniques will also be discussed.
